name: SimonRejzek's Source
subtitle: A collection of apps maintained by Simon Rejzek
description: Apps created or maintained by Simon Rejzek are now available on AltStore and SideStore! Explore the full list of apps or visit my GitHub for more details.

apps.name: YouTube
apps.subtitle: The ultimate YouTube mod with enhanced features.
apps.localizedDescription: YouTube (uYou Enhanced) is a modified version of the official app that includes Ad-blocking, Background playback, PiP mode, Download videos, Improved speed controls and more. Enjoy YouTube with a better experience!

versions.localizedDescription:
- Localization now works properly.
- New options LowContrastMode and YTAppVersionSpoofer have been added.
- YTAppVersionSpoofer has been updated to support iOS YouTube versions up to v20.23.3.
- Support for YouTube versions v17.33.2 to v18.49.3 has been removed as they are discontinued.
- The YouSlider tweak has been fixed.
- AdBlock issues have been fixed for AdBlock Workaround (Lite), AdBlock Workaround, and PoomSmart/YouTube-X.
- Submodules have been updated.

- Fixed instant crash on video due to iSponsorBlock.
- Fixed weird OLED theme in Shorts.
- Added options to hide the Remix / Clip / Download button under the video player.
- Updated app base version to 19.49.7.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

apps.name: YouTube Music
apps.subtitle: The ultimate YouTube Music mod with enhanced features.
apps.localizedDescription: YouTube Music (YTMusicUltimate) is a modified version of the official app that includes Ad-blocking, Background playback, Download songs, Improved speed controls and more. Enjoy YouTube Music with a better experience!

versions.localizedDescription:
- Fixed Downloads tab not working.
- Fixed network permissions.
- Updated YouTube Music version to 8.06.2.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Required for live streaming and video recording.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Needed for connecting to Bluetooth devices.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allows access to contacts for sharing and syncing data.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Required to detect and connect to local network devices.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Required for recording videos and live streaming.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows saving and accessing photos and videos.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allows adding photos and videos to the library.

apps.name: iPlay
apps.subtitle: A free streaming app with no account needed.
apps.localizedDescription: iPlay is a free streaming service without ads or account requirements. Watch movies and TV shows instantly with a smooth and clean interface.

versions.localizedDescription:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Enhanced media playback features.

privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allows access to location data while using the app.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allows adding photos and videos to the library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows access to photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Allows tracking user interactions for ads and analytics.

apps.name: LiveContainer
apps.subtitle: A container for running sideloaded apps.
apps.localizedDescription: LiveContainer allows you to manage and run sideloaded apps with enhanced features like app group isolation, better signature checks, and JIT-less mode diagnostics.

versions.localizedDescription:
- New method for relaunching LiveContainer which makes apps launch faster.
- Fixed Liquid Glass, option now needs to be toggled off and on in order to work.

- Added support for StikJIT.
- Added Game Mode.
- Changed Re-Sign strategy.
- Added support for more languages.
- Fixed bugs.

news.title: YouTube Released!
news.caption: The ultimate YouTube tweak is now available on AltStore and SideStore! Tap to download.
